td.content: s:a white male fire safety officer aged 25 Ys presents with mild persistent fatigue. patient also reports mild weakness, Blood. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking he is a heavy drinker o:Height 74 in, Weight 184 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed IRON - 65 mg daily, and ordered CBC.

td.content: s:a 26 year old M presents with progressive mild persistent fatigue and mild weakness for past 7 weeks. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking he is a chronic alcoholic o:Height 73 in, Weight 182 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14 a:Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed IRON - 65 mg daily, and ordered CBC.
